forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 58. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn stretches its golden fingers across Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens under a blanket of clarity, the early morning air carrying a gentle promise of warmth. The temperature lingers around a comfortable 58 degrees, with the refreshing breath of the west-southwest wind whispering at around eight miles per hour. As daylight breaks, one can anticipate a sun-drenched Wednesday, with the day’s high nudging 66 degrees before gracefully settling in the afternoon around 64. 

For those hoping to embrace the day, consider dressing in layers that reflect the summery optimism outside yet acknowledge the coolness that lingers in the morning shadows. Light fabrics paired with a cozy layer to shield against the gentle chill will serve you well as the day unfolds. Dive into the joy of the outdoors; perhaps take a leisurely walk along Embarcadero, savoring the city’s vibrant pulse. The clarity of the day is inviting for simple pleasures, be it a rooftop brunch basking in the sun or meandering through local markets, wrapped in the fragrant warmth of fresh produce and baked goods. The absence of fog allows for unobscured views of the iconic Golden Gate, beckoning both locals and visitors to bask in the beauty of this remarkable city.
